## packet project delete

Deletes a project

### Synopsis

Example:

packet project delete --id [project_UUID]



```
packet project delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force       Force removal of the project
  -h, --help        Help for delete
  -i, --id string   UUID of the project
```
